column4: if i download the 2.6.19.2 kernel patch, what source can i apply it to? how can i find out how to use the patch?
hey all, i installed suse and it overwrote my grub, i want my old one back, besides ubuntuguide suggesting 'super grub disk' is there a dpkg-reconfigure that i can do or something?
you can still boot to ubuntu correct?
yes, i'm in ubuntu right now
